page.title: Nabi Says Vaccine Helped Smokers Quit
page.text: CHICAGO (Reuters) - Nabi Biopharmaceuticals <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=NABI.O target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">NABI.O</A> on Tuesday said its NicVAX nicotine vaccine showed promising results in helping smokers quit smoking in a small clinical trial, sending its shares up 23 percent in premarket activity.
